bio: I am a PhD student with Prof. Dr. Markus Diesmann and Prof. Dr. Sacha J. van Albada at IAS-6, Research Center JÃ¼lich. My goal is to understand how the spatial connectivity structure of visual brain areas lead to efficient computations such as object detection. To this end, I am constructing and simulating large-scale biologically realistic neural networks of early visual areas constrained by anatomical and physiological data.
